backend/main.mo: Defines Gita data types, mood logic, and functions to generate chapters and support chatbot responses. Provides backend API structures for chapters, verses, moods, and chat interactions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and architectural roles.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Documentation outlining app architecture, tab flows, state management, page behaviors, and backend API surface.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app shell handling tab navigation, scroll reset, theme/session providers, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat composer with text and voice input handling, rotating placeholders, and send logic integrated with speech-to-text.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Displays a modal with safety disclaimers clarifying the chat is not therapy or medical advice.
Renders a list of chat messages with support for verses, follow‑up questions, and different layouts for user and Krishna messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Shows a list of follow‑up question buttons and triggers a callback when one is clicked.
frontend/src/components/chat/MiniAskKris: Provides a compact text input and send button for submitting questions to Krishna.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Displays an error alert with a retry button for failed queries.
frontend/src/components/common/SafeImage: Renders an image with fallback handling and a placeholder if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Flow: Placeholder decoration component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/decorations/Kris: Provides a fixed decorative background with multiple low‑opacity Krishna life scene images and a readability gradient.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Renders the top navigation bar with tab buttons and a theme toggle, including scroll‑to‑top behavior on home.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button that switches between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Loads and displays today's Gita verse with loading, error, and retry states.
Displays a verse with collapsible Sanskrit and English sections, Gen Z interpretation, and an action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching chapters, verses, curated verses, and chatbot responses through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements speech‑to‑text using the browser’s SpeechRecognition API with start/stop controls and transcript state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and system preference, plus a toggle function.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark design tokens, animations, utilities, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Renders the Discover page showing mood cards and navigates to mood‑specific detail views or chat sessions.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Displays curated verses for a selected mood with loading skeletons and a call‑to‑action to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero content, mini chat widget, navigation actions, and branding elements.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Displays a chapter’s metadata and a table of verses, handling loading and error states and allowing verse selection or navigation back.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Shows a searchable list of Gita chapters with loading/error handling and allows selecting a chapter or viewing today's wisdom.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Manages navigation between chapter list, chapter detail, verse detail, and today's wisdom views using internal state and session intents.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Loads and displays a single verse with error and loading states and includes navigation back to the chapter.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements the chat interface with Krishna, managing messages, mood context, pending messages, and invoking the chatbot API.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides global session state for mood, chat history, pending messages, and navigation intents with helper methods to update and consume them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage for styling across the app.
project_state.json: Stores project state including known issues, existing features, and a new backend-hardening request related to Read Gita errors.
